trans-unit.source: Security controls that will be leveraging your identity management system
trans-unit.target: Security controls that will be leveraging your identity management system

trans-unit.source: In general, content management requirements will leverage your identity management system in the following areas:
trans-unit.target: In general, content management requirements will leverage your identity management system in the following areas:

trans-unit.source: Privacy: identifying the user that owns a resource and applying the appropriate controls to maintain integrity.
trans-unit.target: Privacy: identifying the user that owns a resource and applying the appropriate controls to maintain integrity.

trans-unit.source: Data Classification: identify the user or group and level of access to an object according to its classification.
trans-unit.target: Data Classification: identify the user or group and level of access to an object according to its classification.

trans-unit.source: Data Leakage Protection: security controls responsible for protecting data to avoid leakage will need to interact with the identity system to validate the user’s identity.
trans-unit.target: Data Leakage Protection: security controls responsible for protecting data to avoid leakage will need to interact with the identity system to validate the user’s identity.

trans-unit.source: When planning your hybrid identity solution ensure that the following questions are answered according to your organization’s requirements:
trans-unit.target: When planning your hybrid identity solution ensure that the following questions are answered according to your organization’s requirements:

trans-unit.source: Does your company have security controls in place to enforce data privacy?
trans-unit.target: Does your company have security controls in place to enforce data privacy?

trans-unit.source: If yes, will those security controls be able to integrate with the hybrid identity solution that you are going to adopt?
trans-unit.target: If yes, will those security controls be able to integrate with the hybrid identity solution that you are going to adopt?

trans-unit.source: Does your company use data classification?
trans-unit.target: Does your company use data classification?

trans-unit.source: If yes, is the current solution able to integrate with the hybrid identity solution that you are going to adopt?
trans-unit.target: If yes, is the current solution able to integrate with the hybrid identity solution that you are going to adopt?

trans-unit.source: Does your company currently have any solution for data leakage?
trans-unit.target: Does your company currently have any solution for data leakage?

trans-unit.source: If yes, is the current solution able to integrate with the hybrid identity solution that you are going to adopt?
trans-unit.target: If yes, is the current solution able to integrate with the hybrid identity solution that you are going to adopt?

trans-unit.source: Does your company need to audit access to resources?
trans-unit.target: Does your company need to audit access to resources?

trans-unit.source: If yes, what type of resources?
trans-unit.target: If yes, what type of resources?

trans-unit.source: If yes, what level of information is necessary?
trans-unit.target: If yes, what level of information is necessary?

trans-unit.source: If yes, where the audit log must reside?
trans-unit.target: If yes, where the audit log must reside?

trans-unit.source: On-premises or in the cloud?
trans-unit.target: On-premises or in the cloud?

trans-unit.source: Does your company need to encrypt any emails that contain sensitive data (SSNs, credit card numbers, etc)?
trans-unit.target: Does your company need to encrypt any emails that contain sensitive data (SSNs, credit card numbers, etc)?

trans-unit.source: Does your company need to encrypt all documents/contents shared with external business partners?
trans-unit.target: Does your company need to encrypt all documents/contents shared with external business partners?

trans-unit.source: Does your company need to enforce corporate policies on certain kinds of emails (do no reply all, do not forward)?
trans-unit.target: Does your company need to enforce corporate policies on certain kinds of emails (do no reply all, do not forward)?

trans-unit.source: Make sure to take notes of each answer and understand the rationale behind the answer.
trans-unit.target: Make sure to take notes of each answer and understand the rationale behind the answer.

trans-unit.source: By having answered those questions you will select which option best suits your business needs.
trans-unit.target: By having answered those questions you will select which option best suits your business needs.
